channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游댮 06:15 Air anxiety in the Odesa region follow the following messages.
item.description: 游댮 06:15 Air anxiety in the Odesa region follow the following messages.#Odessa_ex This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游댮 06:10 The threat of shelling! Now in Pokrovskaya territorial community artillery shelling. Put in shelter!
item.description: 游댮 06:10 The threat of shelling! Now in Pokrovskaya territorial community artillery shelling. Put in shelter!#Pokrovskaya_ territorial This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 06:04 PM anxiety in Dnipropetrovsk region. Consider that anxiety is still in:- Novomoskovsky Ralolograd district-Sinelnikovsky rayon- Marganets and Marhanetsky territorial community and Nikopol territorial community
item.description: 游리 06:04 PM anxiety in Dnipropetrovsk region. Consider that anxiety is still in:- Novomoskovsky Ralolograd district-Sinelnikovsky rayon- Marganets and Marhanetsky territorial community and Nikopol territorial community This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 06:04 Driven anxiety in the Nikopol District.Plop, anxiety is still in:- Dnipropetrovsk region
item.description: 游리 06:04 Driven anxiety in the Nikopol District.Plop, anxiety is still in:- Dnipropetrovsk region#Nikopol_ region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游댮 06:04 Air anxiety in Novomoskovsky District Surveat for Further Messages.
item.description: 游댮 06:04 Air anxiety in Novomoskovsky District Surveat for Further Messages. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
